Scripts.OnTextChanged: if this:GetText() ~= "" then this:HighlightText() this:SetFocus() end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Searches through the guild for any characters\nwho are level 80 and adds to the guild roster if necessary');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Pushes EPGP values to the officer guild notes\nWill only work if you have permissions to set officer notes!');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Finds anyone on the roster who is \nno longer in the guild and marks as external');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Scans the roster and removes any characters with 0 EP');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Adds given character to the roster\nas a character that is external to the guild');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Turns on Admin Mode.\nShould only be used by the raid leader.');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Shift-Right-Click will add item\ninfo into internal loot table');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Addon will present need/greed text\nwhen an item auction starts');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Reduces EP and GP by the given percentage.\nWARNING: THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!');
GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('Addon will automatically apply EP when boss death detected');

Scripts.OnClick: NOOBDKP_g_options = nil NOOBDKP_g_boss_table = nil NOOBDKP_g_boss_emote = nil NOOBDKP_g_loot_table = nil print(NoobDKP_color .. "Options purged. Reload to continue...")
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(this, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText('This will erase several internal tables and reset to defaults.\nThis may be necessary when addon updates are pushed out.\nWARNING: THIS CANNOT BE UNDONE!!!');

Scripts.OnLoad:
self:SetText("Member (non raid leader) \ 
- First Time: Go to Sync tab and click Guild Scan \ 
- Use the Roster tab to view EPGP values for your raid or guild.\ 
- Use the Auction tab to watch an auction in progress \ 
 Admin (raid leader)\ 
- Go to the Options tab and ensure "Admin Mode" and "Auto EP" is selected.\ 
- When the raid starts, go to the Events tab and click "Create Event". Use the "Generate Name" button to name the raid after your current locaiton + date.\ 
- When a boss is defeated, verify its EP value is automatically added to the raid.\ 
- When loot is ready for distributing, shift-click on the item. A new auction will automatically start in the Auctions tab. Click "Declare Winner" to declare the winner. Click "Add GP" to award the player the GP (value is populated automatically). Select Heroic to use Heroic loot values. Looting must still be done manually.\ 
- When the raid is done, go to the Events tab and click "Close Event".\ 
- Use the Reports tab to generate the desired report(s). Text will be pasted in the text window which can then be copied into a text file, Discord, or website.")
